title: PSA: Elo Tier is not a direct way to confirm someone's skill level.
body: In my personal experience, being bronze is frowned upon in this game because it shows you are new to the game and need help learning. However, to others who are experienced (have played for a year or so), this means they have no clue what they are doing and an older player has no intention of helping these players when they slip up. If you want our community to get better, be a better person.
